title: One For All: Mirror Mode ending soon

replies.body: Now Urf
One of the only featured game modes I've played.
urf if love, urf is life
Need more urf. in fact, URF all for one. Get on it. 10 leblancs on urf. so much teleport, no idea where or why.
The spammable w's would be insane, and leblanc could activate her teammates q. XD
It's actually "Mirrored Hexa URF For All" that we're all looking forward to. Lol :3
Yes, now all we need is URF. pls, dont make me sad. {{champion:32}}
What we really need is Ultra rapid all for one hexakill mirror mode.
maybe not that be crazy

I love how the game mode they made as a joke is the one people want the most. Riot you are so talented that even your pranks turn to  pure gold (except for mirror mode, that was just... well you know).
Mirror mode would of been better on summoners rift. Howling abyss is just... well you know.
Mirror mode is... kinda the worst game mode :(
http://strawpoll.me/1851869/r vote!
Plz bring back URF.  We beg you.
Yes please!!

I found One for All Mirror to be really really boring.. Not sure if that's just me.. Like I loved one for all and i loved URF but this was surprisingly boring.. (probably because of 10 of same champ with same skills doing the same thing x10 so the match never goes anywhere)
yeah i thought it sucked. especially since it was in that stupid map.
That means URF will come back right? {{summoner:10}}
Please Riot, bring back URF. Everyone in the community loves it, and enjoyed playing it so much. You made ARAM a permanent thing, why not URF?

Riot: "Oh wow everyone's enjoying this gamemode!"

Riot: "However,everyone's having TO MUCH FUN..."
Remember dominion?
Still play it. Still love it.
Everyone vote on this straw poll!!!! maybe rito will listen and bring back urf!!! http://strawpoll.me/1851869
URF made league complete to me. if they bring it back, i will change my name to "tybasedrito"
Please let us play URF in custom games. That's fine if you don't want to support it officially, it's just frustrating to see everyone ask for such a basic addition to gameplay and get ignored.
URF please.
I honestly hated this new One for all, I preferred One for all on Summoner's rift
I will be honest with you Riot.... {{summoner:10}} GIVE US URF MODE BACK!! NOW!! {{item:3157}}

I loved the original One for All on Summoner's Rift. However i think putting it on Howling Abyss ruined that game mode, i didn't enjoy it once. If you are going to bring these things out can you put them on multiple maps?
Here people are talking about AFO and URF and other modes and I'm still waiting for some news about Ao Shin.

its been fun, really annoying when all people want to play are the same 5 champs ( {{champion:53}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:81}} ) but still really fun. the original was more entertaining, but this was nice while it lasted.
u forgot fizz and kat
Try Playing {{champion:83}} bro its like chaos
You don't know hell until you play Yorick One For All Mirror Mode.

I felt like this mode needed the teambuilder que system. If I was ever lucky enough to get my %10 champion someone would always dodge. Too much {{champion:44}} hate. Anyways, I understand that would make my ques longer, but if I could select the champions I was willing to play, and que for only THOSE champions it would have been a more enjoyable experience. If I have to play another {{champion:30}} game....
This would have been alot more fun if it was on the rift. :c
Not Really going to miss it, It was fun.. But turned very annoying very quickly
So many people that want urf we might start a riot but then our riot will want urf and riot has that power so in the end urf wins.

Was i the only one that didn't really like this? it would've been fine if it was one for all but not mirrored, because from what i saw as soon as one team got ahead they basically won. you all scale the same. If you're behind you can't catch back up. i would've preferred it on summoners rift cause than you could go and farm and catch back up

What if Rito releases URF skin for WW instead of the gamemode...?

"We heard your pleads and cries, so we've done it! Warwicks URF skin, just as everyone has requested! trollface.jpg"
* urf is good for big men like me {{champion:79}}
Riot u can do better.. Bring back urf
Urf is good for strong man like myself. {{champion:201}}
rito bring back urf thats the gamemode the people actually liked! {{champion:9}}
We should have URF weekends...please Rito ;_;
It's all about URF
I really miss URF not only because of the great lols but because of it's ingenuity and style. Riot make it permanent please!

This doesn't make me sad at all, it was incredibly lame. The only reason I like to play "featured" game modes so that it changes the boring Meta in Summoner's Rift. Considering that this game mode wasn't even in summoner's rift...

RIOT JUST BRING BACK URF! WE HAVE GOTTEN HOW MANY PETITIONS WITH HUNDREDS OF THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE ACCEPTING IT! TAKE OUT DOMINION AND PUT IN URF IF YOU HAVE TO!!!!! EVEN THOUGH HE DIED BY{{champion:19}} DOESENT MEAN HE ISNT IN OUR HEARTS! <3 URF
